text: Palm Springs, California is a city in Riverside County, California. As of 2020, 44,575 people lived there. It is one of the largest cities in the Coachella Valley. Palm Springs and the surrounding area have many retirement communities (places where retired people live). The city and surrounding area have almost 100 golf courses. Palm Springs has a hot desert climate (BWh in the KÃ¶ppen climate classification). ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Spa towns in the United States Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Riverside County, California
title: Palm Springs, California
